Description: Solid-cast copper alloy figure of Anubis(?) wearing a wig and an extended shendyt-kilt; right arm raised; tang(broken) beneath the rectangular base.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: Dr Joseph John Acworth
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2009 Apr-present, Swaffham Museum, Egyptian Gallery, LT Loan 2007/08 Nov-Jan, BM, Room 3, Divine Cat: Speaking to the gods in ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Donated by: Mrs Marion Whiteford Acworth JP
